notes: For (thin) frozen fillet, bake at 450F for 4 minutes, then flip and bake for 8-12 min. Cover with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Frozen Recipe Source: http://cookthestory.com/how-to-cook-fish-from-frozen/
recipe: Cover a baking sheet with tin foil and prep the fish
Bake 25-30 minutes for large fillets (>1 inch tall) and 15-20 for thin ones
